General.Name: Shree Ram Proteins Limited
General.Description: Shree Ram Proteins Limited engages in cotton seeds extraction business in India. Its products include cotton linter, seed hull, seed meal, seed wash oil, and seed refine oil; and soyabean meal, rapeseed meal, groundnut meal, and raw cotton bales. The company also exports its products. Shree Ram Proteins Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Rajkot, India.
